special_text:
[i]“I was born seeing all and knowing none. In such a place, I suspect you too would fall on your sword.”[/i]
Distribute three +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.
Draw X cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
Exile this enchantment, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
rules_text2:
Reach
When Am’Atambi enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield until Am’Atambi leaves the battlefield.
When Am’Atambi dies, return this card to its owner’s hand.
